item.title: Marsha add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "Some people are born to make great art and others are born to appreciate it. â€¦ It is a kind of talent in itself, to be an audience, whether you are the spectator in the gallery or you are listening to the voice of the world's greatest soprano. Not everyone can be the artist. There have to be those who witness the art, who love and appreciate what they have been privileged to see." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I don't like that man. I must get to know him better." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "To choose doubt as a philosophy of life is akin to choosing immobility as a means of transportation." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Isak Dinesen
Marsha add a quote by David Orr
item.description: "Hope is a verb with its shirtsleeves rolled up." -- David Orr

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Maxine Hong Kingston
item.description: "In a time of destruction, create something." -- Maxine Hong Kingston

item.title: Marsha add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "But we can't go back. We can only go forward." -- Libba Bray
